title: (x) Sukiyaki House restaurant window sign - ITC Korinna {Dav}
content:
the restaurant was founded in 1975 so maybe the typeface is from that era.

the “U” is the most unique...

author: russ_thx1138

comments.content:
Was this photograph taken in Calgary?

- Lex
I’m sorry, Dav, but you didn’t phrase it in the form of a question.
yes this photo was taken in calgary...
yes calgary, sukiyaki house... nice restaurant, really bad website... I’m redesigning it and want to use the typeface from the sign.
